Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.validation

Class UserValidator

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.librarymanagement.validation.UserValidator
public class UserValidator extends Object
This class provides Validations for all User data.
Author:
KishorMuruganandham

  • Constructor Details

    • UserValidator

      public UserValidator (User user)
      Constructs a UserValidator instance with a specific user to validate.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to be validated.

    • UserValidator

      public UserValidator()
      Constructs a UserValidator instance without a specific user. This constructor can be used when validating users with individual validation methods.

  • Method Details

    • validateAll

      public void validateAll() throws ValidationException
      Validates all User attributes.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If any validation fails

    • validateEmail

      public boolean validateEmail (String email) throws ValidationException
      Validates an email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to validate
      Returns:
      true if email is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If email is invalid or empty

    • validateMobileNo

      public boolean validateMobileNo (long mobileNo) throws ValidationException
      Validates a mobile number.
      Parameters:
      mobileNo - The mobile number to validate
      Returns:
      true if mobile number is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If mobile number is empty

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword (String password) throws ValidationException
      Validates a password.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If the password is empty or too short

    • validateGender

      public boolean validateGender (char gender) throws ValidationException
      Validates a gender.
      Parameters:
      gender - The gender to validate
      Returns:
      true if gender is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If gender is invalid

    • validateProfileImage

      public boolean validateProfileImage (String profileImage) throws ValidationException
      Validates a profile image URL.
      Parameters:
      profileImage - The profile image URL to validate
      Returns:
      true if profile image URL is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If profile image URL is empty or invalid

    • validateName

      public boolean validateName (String name) throws ValidationException
      Validates a name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to validate
      Returns:
      true if the name is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If the name is empty or has an invalid format
